title: Programming Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of programming with languages like C, C++, Python, and Java. Build strong foundation in logic and problem-solving.

title: Web Development
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks. Create responsive websites and web applications from scratch.

title: Electronics & Hardware
description: Understand digital circuits, microprocessors, and embedded systems. Work with Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and IoT devices.

title: On Job Training (OJT)
description: Real industry experience through internships at tech companies. Apply classroom knowledge in professional environments.
